375 inline IInteractiveShape* CViewBase::GetMouseShapePtr() const
376 {
377  if (!m_isMouseShapeValid){
378  CalcMouseShape();
379  m_isMouseShapeValid = true;
380  }
381  return m_mouseShapePtr;
382 }

399 inline int CViewBase::GetLayersCount() const
400 {
401  return int(m_layers.size());
402 }
403 
404 
405 inline IViewLayer& CViewBase::GetLayer(int index) const
406 {
407  if (GetLayersCount() <= 0){
408  CViewBase* view = const_cast<CViewBase*> (this);
409  view->InsertDefaultLayers();
410  }
411 
412  Q_ASSERT((index >= 0) && (index < int(m_layers.size())));
413 
414  IViewLayer* layerPtr = m_layers[index];
415  Q_ASSERT(layerPtr != NULL);
416 
417  return *layerPtr;
418 }

435 inline i2d::CRect CViewBase::GetBoundingBox() const
436 {
437  if (!m_isBoundingBoxValid){
438  m_boundingBox = CalcBoundingBox();
439 
440  m_isBoundingBoxValid = true;
441  }
442 
443  return m_boundingBox;
444 }

506 
507 inline void CViewBase::SetBackgroundBufferValid(bool state)
508 {
509  if (state != m_isBackgroundBufferValid){
510  if (!state){
511  m_invalidatedBox = GetClientRect();
512  }
513  m_isBackgroundBufferValid = state;
514  }
515 }
